page.title: 10CHURCHES IN DALBEATTIE
page.content: {Craignair Church,}Church of Scotland, is 145 years old.Rev N D Craig is the minister there . It has about 2500 members. {Park Church,}Church of Scotland,was built in 1843 and has 350 members.Rev R Pettigrew has been minister there since 1959. {St Peter's,}RC Church, was opened in 1814.It is the oldest church in the diocese.Monsignor T K Conway has been a priest there for 9 years.It has about 450 parishioners. {Christ Church,}Episcopalian,has 450 members.Rev M Wilson is the rector there.The church was opened in 1875 but was consecrated much later in 1941. Members of other religions, such as {Baptists,Jehovah's Witnesses}and{ {Ba'hais}are also catered for.
